The directions vide Policy Circular No. 3.1.30/2021 dated 20.01.2021 to continue with taking the additional BG for Abnormally Low Bids (ALBs) with maximum ceiling of Performance Security BG have been reconsidered and it has now been decided generally not to take additional BG for ALBs in future (except in some exceptional cases) and instead, the measures to ensure quality of works as proposed in Policy Guidelines No. 15.8/2021 dated 15.01.2021 shall be further strengthened as given below in order to ensure that the contractors of ALBs complete the projects with good quality as envisaged in the contract agreements at the quoted price: Sr_ Measures to be taken for ALBs Bids 10% to Bids more No. 20% below than 20% below Project to be identified separately on Data Lake Yes Yes and the details loaded should be monitored by PD, RO & Tech: Division and submit a monthly report on major issues for perusal of Member / Chairman 2 Deployment of   sufficient resources by the AEIPD/RO to monitor every Contractor (Key Personnel, Plant & Equipment, month, issue notices and material, etc: ) matching with the construction take timely actions to programme ensure quality and that (ii) Monthly   drone video recording of project there are no slippages in the highway as per Policy Guidelines dated project completion: 10.06.2021 Tech.
